name: H4T3FL1RT
description:
WARNING ABOUT THE CONTENT: Graphic Depictions of Violence (13+)

H4T3FL1RT is an adaptation in the form of Visual Novel of the fan-fiction by Lbk-Princen created by EctoTERROR.

Such fan-fiction is based on the webcomic "Homestuck" by Andrew Hussie.

The story talks about Terezi Pyrope in the far end of her adolescence  slapping the ass of John Egbert to make him understand what she feels for him. A courtship that will be complicated considering  the limitation of his understanding of Black Romance. Or at least, that's what she thinks.

Art and Coding by EctoTERROR: https://twitter.com/TerrorEcto

Story and Writing by Lbk-Princen:  https://lbk-princen.tumblr.com/

Music by The Black Curtain: https://homestuck.bandcamp.com/track/pale-rapture-2
